CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Loan__c,""), ISPICKVAL(Account.ProvinceResidency__c,""), ISBLANK(Name), ISBLANK(Amount), ISBLANK(APR_1__c), ISBLANK(APR_2__c), ISBLANK(Style_of_Cause_Description__c), ISBLANK(Name_of_Court__c), ISBLANK(Court_File_No__c), ISBLANK(Admin_Fee__c), ISBLANK(Law_Firm__c), ISBLANK(Lawyer__c), ISBLANK(Attorney_Full_Address__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Street__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_City__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Province__c), ISBLANK(Primary_Contact_Postal_Code__c), ISBLANK( Scenario__c ), /*Lump-Sum Exclusive*/ AND(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Loan__c,"Lump-Sum"), ISBLANK(Loan_Amt_minus_Admin_Fee__c)), /*Facility Loan Exclusive*/ AND(ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Loan__c,"Facility Loan"),OR(ISBLANK(First_Drawdown_Amount__c),ISBLANK(Amount_Paid_to_Borrower__c))) ) , False , True )
CustomField.label: Generate Loan Doc Check
